Wordsworth Planner

#Web Design

XD, Photoshop

Feb. 2019

Wordsworth Planner

This is a landing page design for campaign.
In keeping with the client's request, thought about what they wanted to tell the most in this campaign and designed it. To use purple in CTA as the theme color of them, it tries to urge click action. In addition, using gold as a key point and expressed the elegance that they have.

Colors

Theme color

#BFAE8E
#552F65
#F1F1F1

Used the color #BFAE8E to represent the brilliant women and the elegance of the Website

Used the color #552F65 which is deeper color than the others for CTA.

Fonts

Used the same font style to avoid breaking the existing client website worldview.

Base - Georgia

Regular

Heading - Hoefler Text

Regular
